content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction area
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)
- Beltgroup (position x2) that connects burner mining drill at position x1 to furnace at position x

### Iron gear wheel factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z) for crafting iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Furnace (position y) for smelting iron plates

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates; ensure you have sufficient iron plates available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
